column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk: On the morning of March 22
column5: the provincial military police force sent 4 suspects and evidence to the Preah Sihanouk Provincial Court in connection for  drug trafficking.------The four suspects were detained at different targets
column6: with three Chinese and one Cambodian arrested.------ Wei Pao
column9: both Chinese were caught with 0.37 grams of meth.------Chen Cheng
column10: a 22-year-old Chinese man was caught with 3 packets totaling 2.29 gram.------Seang. Roon
